name: My Cute Kitty 2019 Pro, Virtual Cat game for Kids
name_original: My Cute Kitty 2019 Pro, Virtual Cat game for Kids
description:
My Cute Kitty 2019 is a virtual cat simulation for kids.

Why I need this?

-The Cutest kitty game in the World

-The game has no Ads, no In-App Purchases

Other Features of the game

-No internet connection required

-Only 10 MB

-Cute beautiful Kitty with Lots of Animations

-Fun visuals

-Dedicated to Kids

-No user data collecting

Developed and published by SR Studios Kerala.
